import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import {asset} from '../../assets/admin_assets/assets' const MenuTop=()=> { useEffect(() => { const toggleBtn = document.querySelector('.toggle_btn') const toggleBtnIcon = document.querySelector('.toggle_btn i') const dropDownMenu = document.querySelector('.dropdown_menu') toggleBtn.onclick = function () { dropDownMenu.classList.toggle('open') const isOpen = dropDownMenu.classList.contains('open') toggleBtnIcon.classList = isOpen ? 'fa-solid fa-xmark' : 'fa-solid fa-bars' } }, []); return (
